issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Titanium SDK version: 1.5.0 (12/06/10 08:42 4d92d40), G2, not seen in sim. specific steps to repro:

1.Base UI > Window Soft Input
2.select then launch SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_UNSPECIFIED
3.by way of trackball, click focus to the bottom most field
4.trackball move up one field and click
5.move up to the top most (trackball)

view results: see screenshot

6.type in the field

results: the second field still appears to have focus, if you enter text it will not appear until the keyboard is dismissed. You must use trackball, use touch focus and this is resolved.

Not new.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: focus not released on SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_UNSPECIFIED , causes input issues

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
